settings.subtitle: Our store is designed to be user-friendly and easy to navigate, so customers can find what they're looking for quickly and easily

settings.question: What is the Return/Refund Policy?
settings.answer: The return/refund policy is outlined on our Refund and Return Policy page.

settings.question: What countries do you ship to?
settings.answer: At this time we offer shipping to the USA. More countries coming soon!

settings.question: Where can I check my order status?
settings.answer: To check the status of your order proceed to the Check Order Status page for details.

settings.question: What shipping options do you offer?
How can I be notified when a specific product is back in stock?
settings.answer: If you’d like to be notified when a specific item is back in stock please send a request to be notified at support@majesticequines.com

settings.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged or defective product?
settings.answer: If you receive a damaged or defective item please reach out to support@majesticequines.com with photos of the damaged item as soon as possible. After reviewing the provided details a replacement or refund will be issued along with instructions on how to return the product.

settings.question: What payment methods do you accept?
How long does it take to receive a response to my inquiry?
settings.answer: Inquiries sent before 5:00PM EST will receive a same-day response. Any inquiry sent after 5:00PM will receive a response the next day.
